**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 135 2.0 **Price** 13,000 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A _zealot staff's_ color, iconography, and materials vary depending on the faith it's dedicated to. An [Iomedaean](/Deities.aspx?ID=9) staff might be forged of gold and shaped like an ornamental sword, while a [Lamashtan](/Deities.aspx?ID=11) one could instead be made of blackened iron depicting monstrous faces. Used as a weapon, the staff is a _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_. The staff represents vehement support of the deity to whom the staff is dedicated, punishing defiance. When you prepare this staff, if you don’t worship its deity, you become [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68) 1 until your next daily preparations. **Activate** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Trigger** You hit with a Strike using the staff; **Effect** A vicious blast of deific power explodes as you hit. You deal an additional 1d4 [spirit](/Traits.aspx?ID=737) damage per damage die of the staff to the target of your Strike. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. Add the cleric spells granted by your deity to the list for their rank and each higher rank. For example, a zealot staff of [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=292) would add [_breathe fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1457) at 1st through 7th rank, [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1530) at 3rd through 7th rank, and [_wall of fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1748) at 4th through 7th rank.
  • **Cantrip** [_divine lance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1498)
  • **1st** [_bane_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1447)
  • **2nd** [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1445)
  • **3rd** [_warding aggression_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1029)
  • **4th** [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1499)
  • **5th** [_crisis of faith_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1478), _divine wrath_
  • **6th** [_spiritual armament_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1687), [_zealous conviction_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1760)
  • **7th** _crisis of faith_, [_divine decree_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1495)
**Craft Requirements** You worship the deity to which the staff is dedicated. Supply one casting of all listed spells, including your deity’s cleric spells.
name: Zealot Staff
